name: Alpha-X-Multi-Device-Bot
description: üöÄ Alpha-X project is bot for whatsapp, With enjoyable things and fun to use whatsapp üòâ

SESSION.description: Type here your QR code. Get it using >> replit.com/@AlphaXteam/Alpha-X-MD-Qr

DATABASE_URL.description: Type here your SQL db url. Dont know how to get >> watch this video. (youtu.be/zlPCUzocwHw)

WORK_TYPE.description: Alpha-X Working Type. If you use ‚Äúpublic‚Äù, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use ‚Äúprivate‚Äù, only you can use your bot.

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language - English => EN , Sinhala=> SI , Kannada => KN , Turkish => TR , Malayalam => ML , Russian => RU , Azerbaijian => AZ , Hindi => HI [ More Languages coming soon.. ]

COMMAND_LIST_KEY.description: Customizable COMMAND LIST KEY type a key to get all command list >> EX: alpha

ALIVE_MSG_KEY.description: Customizable ALIVE MSG KEY type a key to check if bot work >> EX: alive

SUDO.description: Sudo mode is gives other controler for your bot , Leave it blank if you'r not using it , Number must be Like 94XXXXXXX,0

SEND_REACT.description: Write true if you want to auto react to commands.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 945xxxx && 94xxxx-1xxx or 91xxxx,94xxx...

BLOCK_USERS.description: Choose which users that bot won't work in groups. Ex: 945xxxx && 94xxxx-1xxx or 91xxxx,94xxx...

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

PM_BLOCK.description: Write true if you want to block inbox commands ( not for you)

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.

AUTO_BIO.description: Set true for auto date to your bio, time in biography.

ALIVE_MSG.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => 'default', to change back.

AFK_MSG.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => 'default', to change back.

KICKME_MSG.description: Customizable KICKME_MSG! Use => 'default', to change back.

ADD_MSG.description: Customizable ADD_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

PROMOTE_MSG.description: Customizable PROMOTE_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

DEMOTE_MSG.description: Customizable DEMOTE_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

BAN_MSG.description: Customizable ADD_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

MUTE_MSG.description: Customizable MUTE_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

UNMUTE_MSG.description: Customizable UNMUTE_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

BLOCK_MSG.description: Customizable BLOCK_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

UNBLOCK_MSG.description: Customizable UNBLOCK_MSG Use => 'default', to change back.

CAPTION.description: Customizable CAPTION Message! Type a caption for bot.

BIO_NAME.description: Customizable Auto Bio Name Message!, type a name or somthing to show with auto bio.

BOT_NAME.description: Customizable BOT NAME! Type a Name for your bot.

COMMAND_EMOJI.description: Customizable COMMAND_EMOJI to show in command list.

DESC_EMOJI.description: Customizable DESC_EMOJI to show in command list.

WARN_EMOJI.description: Customizable WARN_EMOJI to show in command list.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Customizable ALVE_PIC!, Type a image link here.

WLCM_GIF.description: Customizable WLCM_GIF!, Type a video link here.

GBYE_GIF.description: Customizable GBYE_GIF!, Type a video link here.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.
